existing_features.title: Footer with attribution and business info

existing_features.title: Tailwind-based theming with CSS variables and dark mode
existing_features.description: Configures Tailwind with CSS-variable color tokens (including chart/sidebar tokens), container sizing, radius tokens, and dark mode support; includes animate/typography/container-query plugins.

existing_features.title: Internet Identity authentication context provider
existing_features.description: Provides a React Context for Internet Identity with login/logout, identity persistence, delegation validation, and status flags (initializing/idle/logging-in/success/error).

existing_features.title: Identity-aware ICP actor creation hook
existing_features.description: Creates an anonymous or authenticated backend actor via `createActorWithConfig`, keyed by principal in TanStack Query, and invalidates/refetches dependent queries when identity changes.

existing_features.title: Backend authorized principal registry and gateway sync
existing_features.description: Motoko module maintains an in-memory list of authorized principals and can refresh it by querying a cashier canister for `storage_gateway_principal_list_v1`. Provides `isAuthorized` checks.

existing_features.title: Backend cycles refill/top-up to cashier
existing_features.description: Calculates available cycles (leaving a reserved amount) and sends cycles to a cashier canister via `account_top_up_v1`, optionally capped by a proposed amount.

existing_features.title: Backend blob lifecycle administration endpoints (liveness, dead-blob pruning, GC trigger)
existing_features.description: Exposes methods to check if a blob is live, retrieve up to 10,000 dead blobs (authorized callers only), confirm deletion (authorized callers only), and force GC; also returns a simple upload certificate response.

architecturalNotes: Frontend is a React SPA composed of section components (Hero, Services, Gallery, Contact, Footer) assembled in App.tsx.
Styling uses Tailwind CSS with CSS-variable-driven OKLCH color tokens and dark mode via the 'class' strategy; tailwind plugins include typography, container-queries, and tailwindcss-animate.
UI primitives are imported from a local '@/components/ui/*' layer (likely shadcn/ui + Radix patterns), e.g., Card and Dialog.
Frontend includes an authentication layer using Internet Identity via @dfinity/auth-client, exposed through a React Context provider (InternetIdentityProvider) with derived status flags.
Actor creation is encapsulated in a React Query hook (useActor) that produces either an anonymous or identity-bound actor and invalidates/refetches non-actor queries on identity changes.
Backend is a Motoko canister that composes functionality via an `include MixinStorage();` mixin pattern (modular capability injection).
Backend storage authorization uses a mutable in-memory registry of authorized principals, refreshed by querying a 'cashier' canister whose principal is provided via an environment variable.
Backend interacts with IC system primitives (Prim.*) for storage blob liveness/dead blob enumeration/pruning and triggers explicit GC via a special __motoko_gc_trigger call.
knownIssues: frontend contains two different CSS files listed: frontend/src/index.css (bakery-themed OKLCH palette) and frontend/index.css (generic palette). This duplication may cause confusion or incorrect styling depending on which file is actually imported/built (main.tsx imports './index.css' from src).
Gallery.tsx maintains `selectedImage` state but never uses it (the dialog uses `image.src` directly).
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts is an empty placeholder; any expectation of data fetching is currently unimplemented by design.
Frontend is largely static but still includes React Query + Internet Identity + actor creation plumbing; currently no shown components actually use the actor or identity to call the backend.
Internet Identity provider URL is sourced from `process.env.II_URL`; missing/incorrect env config will break login flows.
Backend requires `CAFFFEINE_STORAGE_CASHIER_PRINCIPAL` env var; if unset, getCashierPrincipal traps and dependent calls fail.
Storage.refillCashier computes `Nat.sub(currentBalance, reservedCycles)` which can trap/underflow if currentBalance < reservedCycles; there is no guard.
Authorized principals registry in the backend is `transient` and not stable; it will reset on upgrades/redeploys until `_caffeineStorageUpdateGatewayPrincipals` is called again.

_caffeineStorageUpdateGatewayPrincipals is callable by anyone (no authorization check), potentially allowing untrusted callers to trigger repeated remote calls to the cashier canister (resource/DoS concern).
_caffeineStorageCreateCertificate returns a static {method='upload', blob_hash=...} response and does not validate blob hashes or caller authorization (may be incomplete/stub behavior).
